description: Comprehensive peripheral device collection - Full parity with macOS Swift implementation

external_monitors_device_desc.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\DISPLAY\\', ''), '\\DeviceDesc', '') as pnp_device_id, data as friendly_name, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\DISPLAY\\%\\%\\DeviceDesc' AND data != '';
external_monitors_device_desc.description: External monitor device descriptions with parsed PnP IDs

external_monitors_hardware_ids.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\DISPLAY\\', ''), '\\HardwareID', '') as pnp_device_id, data as hardware_id, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\DISPLAY\\%\\%\\HardwareID' AND data != '';
external_monitors_hardware_ids.description: External monitor hardware IDs with parsed PnP IDs

external_monitors_class.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\DISPLAY\\', ''), '\\Class', '') as pnp_device_id, data as class, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\DISPLAY\\%\\%\\Class' AND data != '';

external_monitors_service.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\DISPLAY\\', ''), '\\Service', '') as pnp_device_id, data as service, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\DISPLAY\\%\\%\\Service' AND data != '';
external_monitors_service.description: External monitor service information with parsed PnP IDs

printers_registry.query: SELECT REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Print\\Printers\\', '') as printer_name, name, data, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Print\\Printers\\%' AND name IN ('Name', 'Printer Driver', 'Port', 'Share Name', 'Location', 'Description') AND data != '';

usb_device_registry.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\USB\\', ''), '\\DeviceDesc', '') as usb_device_id, data as device_description, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\USB\\%\\%\\DeviceDesc' AND data != '';
usb_device_registry.description: USB device descriptions with parsed device IDs

usb_device_hardware_ids.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\USB\\', ''), '\\HardwareID', '') as usb_device_id, data as hardware_id, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\USB\\%\\%\\HardwareID' AND data != '';
usb_device_hardware_ids.description: USB device hardware IDs with parsed device IDs

input_devices_keyboards.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\HID\\', ''), '\\DeviceDesc', '') as hid_device_id, data as device_description, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\HID\\%\\%\\DeviceDesc' AND LOWER(data) LIKE '%keyboard%' AND data != '';
input_devices_keyboards.description: Connected keyboard devices from HID enumeration

input_devices_mice.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\HID\\', ''), '\\DeviceDesc', '') as hid_device_id, data as device_description, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\HID\\%\\%\\DeviceDesc' AND LOWER(data) LIKE '%mouse%' AND data != '';
input_devices_mice.description: Connected mouse and pointing devices from HID enumeration

input_devices_trackpads.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\HID\\', ''), '\\DeviceDesc', '') as hid_device_id, data as device_description, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\HID\\%\\%\\DeviceDesc' AND (LOWER(data) LIKE '%trackpad%' OR LOWER(data) LIKE '%touchpad%' OR LOWER(data) LIKE '%precision%') AND data != '';
input_devices_trackpads.description: Connected trackpad and touchpad devices from HID enumeration

input_devices_tablets.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\HID\\', ''), '\\DeviceDesc', '') as hid_device_id, data as device_description, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\HID\\%\\%\\DeviceDesc' AND (LOWER(data) LIKE '%wacom%' OR LOWER(data) LIKE '%huion%' OR LOWER(data) LIKE '%xp-pen%' OR LOWER(data) LIKE '%intuos%' OR LOWER(data) LIKE '%cintiq%' OR LOWER(data) LIKE '%bamboo%') AND data != '';
input_devices_tablets.description: Connected graphics tablets from HID enumeration

audio_devices_render.query: SELECT REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\MMDevices\\Audio\\Render\\', '') as device_id, name, data as device_info, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\MMDevices\\Audio\\Render\\%\\Properties\\%' AND name LIKE '%FriendlyName%' AND data != '';

audio_devices_capture.query: SELECT REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\MMDevices\\Audio\\Capture\\', '') as device_id, name, data as device_info, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\MMDevices\\Audio\\Capture\\%\\Properties\\%' AND name LIKE '%FriendlyName%' AND data != '';

bluetooth_devices.query: SELECT REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\BTHPORT\\Parameters\\Devices\\', '') as device_address, name, data as device_info, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\BTHPORT\\Parameters\\Devices\\%' AND name IN ('Name', 'Manufacturer', 'ClassOfDevice') AND data != '';
bluetooth_devices.description: Paired Bluetooth devices with name and manufacturer

camera_devices.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\USB\\', ''), '\\DeviceDesc', '') as device_id, data as device_description, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\USB\\%\\%\\DeviceDesc' AND (LOWER(data) LIKE '%camera%' OR LOWER(data) LIKE '%webcam%' OR LOWER(data) LIKE '%imaging%') AND data != '';
camera_devices.description: Camera and webcam devices from USB enumeration

storage_devices_usbstor.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\USBSTOR\\', ''), '\\FriendlyName', '') as device_id, data as device_name, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\USBSTOR\\%\\%\\FriendlyName' AND data != '';
storage_devices_usbstor.description: USB storage devices from USBSTOR enumeration

thunderbolt_devices.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\PCI\\', ''), '\\DeviceDesc', '') as device_id, data as device_description, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\PCI\\%\\%\\DeviceDesc' AND (LOWER(data) LIKE '%thunderbolt%' OR LOWER(data) LIKE '%usb4%') AND data != '';
thunderbolt_devices.description: Thunderbolt and USB4 devices from PCI enumeration

scanner_devices.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\USB\\', ''), '\\DeviceDesc', '') as device_id, data as device_description, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Enum\\USB\\%\\%\\DeviceDesc' AND (LOWER(data) LIKE '%scanner%' OR LOWER(data) LIKE '%mfp%' OR LOWER(data) LIKE '%multifunction%') AND data != '';

serial_ports.query: SELECT name as port_name, data as device_path, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\HARDWARE\\DEVICEMAP\\SERIALCOMM' AND data != '';
